channel.title: [PI]Intensify - InsidiaX Based(Base Change)
channel.description:
Hey guys. I have recently started developing private servers again, and thought i would start my own project. I will be working on this alone using snippets, my knowledge, and tutorials.
NOW BASED OFF OF INSIDIA X. Updated logs below.
Update Log: [code] Added ::spawn command(permanently spawns npc by writing into the cfg file) Added instant item switching Edited shops with more convenient items Started to add donator zone Added Mystery Boxes Added Bonfires [/code]
Things to come [code] -Add custom bosses -Add clue scrolls -Finish donator zone -Add x5 x10 or all options to smithing -4 options of starters with custom interface(Fighter, magician, archer, or skiller) -3 difficulty levels(Easy, Medium, Hard) -Slayer point store -Add a pet system -Recode the firemaking skill -Add spirit tree [/code]
Will add pictures soon!

item.title: [PI]Intensify - InsidiaX Based(Base Change)
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

Hey guys. I have recently started developing private servers again, and thought i would start my own project. I will be working on this alone using snippets, my knowledge, and tutorials.

NOW BASED OFF OF INSIDIA X. Updated logs below.

Update Log:

Added ::spawn command(permanently spawns npc by writing into the cfg file)
Added instant item switching
Edited shops with more convenient items
Started to add donator zone
Added Mystery Boxes
Added Bonfires

Things to come

-Add custom bosses
-Add clue scrolls
-Finish donator zone
-Add x5 x10 or all options to smithing
-4 options of starters with custom interface(Fighter, magician, archer, or skiller)
-3 difficulty levels(Easy, Medium, Hard)
-Slayer point store
-Add a pet system
-Recode the firemaking skill
-Add spirit tree

Will add pictures soon!

Read full topic
